index.mainHeadingTUfast: Your productivity tool for TU Dresden
index.subHeading: TUfast helps you navigate TU Dresden's online tools more quickly
index.heroShorts: For students, by students   Â·   Free   Â·   Open Source
index.featureLoginText: Log in automatically to all online portals: selma, OPAL, SLUB, Mail, ...
index.featureNavText: Quick access and hotkeys for many online portals
index.featureOpalText: All your courses directly in your browser, without having to open OPAL
index.featureImproveText: Open documents directly in your browser, improved layout, grade distribution, and attempt tracker
index.safetyDataText: TU FAST stores user-related data only locally on your device. If you delete the extension, all your data will also be deleted. For more information, please refer to our [privacy policy](https://tu-fast.de/datenschutz).
index.safetyMoneyText: TUfast is an [open-source project](https://github.com/TUfast-TUD/TUfast_TUD). This means we work with 100% transparency. You can view the code yourself on GitHub at any time and contribute. TUfast is free for you to use.
index.aboutSectionTitle: Why is studying online so complicated?
aboutText: At TU Dresden, we juggle OPAL, Selma, Hisqis, and Outlook every day, wasting time and fraying our nerves in the process. So we asked ourselves: Can't this be done more easily? This question gave rise to TUfast. It started as a small side project during our studies, then grew into a platform that quickly reached more and more students. What began with a few lines of code became a shared mission: to make everyday digital life at TU Dresden easier.

Today, TUfast is an open-source project run by students and alumni of TU Dresden. It is used by over 4,000 students at TU Dresden. Everyone involved in the project does so on a voluntary basis and with the desire to make online teaching a little easier for other students.

The project is supported by, among others, the [DigitalAcceleratorProgramm des Stifterverbands](https://www.stifterverband.org/digitalchangemaker-accelerator), the [output.dd project show](https://output-dd.de/blog/project-post/tufast-tu-dresden-2/) of the Faculty of Computer Science, several student councils at TU Dresden, and generous sponsors on [BuyMeACoffee](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/olihausdoerfer). We are not there yet: Our next step is to further expand TUfastâ€”for TU Dresden, for other universities in Saxony, and for anyone who needs a little more structure and ease in digital teaching.
**By students, for students. Free and open source.**

members.name: You?
members.role: Anyone can participate in the project via GitHub!
members.occupancy_in_tufast: Below you will find a few ideas, but feel free to contribute your own.

content:
What's cool about TUfast? **Real software development for over 4,000 students!**
Anyone can contribute via **GitHub**. From small fixes to new features.

If you want to join us, write to us at [frage@tu-fast.de](mailto:frage@tu-fast.de).
Or get started right away on [GitHub](https://github.com/TUfast-TUD/TUfast_TUD) (see [Contributing.md](https://github.com/TUfast-TUD/TUfast_TUD/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)).
Here you will find ideas for getting involved, but we would also love to hear your own suggestions! :)

listings.title: TUfast for Safari
listings.content:
We get many requests that TUfast should also support Safari. You have experience with developing for macOS/Safari? Then do your fellow students a favor and take over the implementation! 

 Learnings: Distribution of web extensions, web development, macOS/Safari

listings.title: TUfast for mobile
listings.content:
Service-Workers are the latest trend in web technologies - that's why we want to use them. This will enable us to make TUfast available for mobile devices and to add many new features. 

 Learnings: Mobile optimization, service workers

listings.title: TUfast for HTW (and other Universities)
listings.content:
TUfast is great - students at the HTW also noticed that. Therefore, we would like to make TUfast available for HTW as well. This includes: Designing a software concept to integrate more universities and implementing it for HTW. 

 Learning: Software design, web development, user oriented services

listings.title: IT Security
listings.content:
You are interested in IT-Security? Perfect! We are looking for someone who looks into the security aspects of TUfast. We already got feedback and a scrutiny from the Informationssicherheit TU Dresden. In the future, we would like to evaluate security internally and implement measures accordingly. 

 Learnings: IT security, Websecurity, Webdevelopment

listings.title: TUfast Telemetry
listings.content:
We would like to collect anonymous usage data for TUfast to make the service even better. This data should be published on our website as well. Possible tools include Clickhouse or OpenTelemetry. 

 Learnings: Product telemetry, back-end design and implementation

listings.title: Marketing
listings.content:
We value marketing as a huge part of our project. Our goal is, to develop a clear brand communication and distribute TUfast to as many users as possible. You want to gather experience in marketing and brand communication? Then this is the perfect spot for you! 

 Learnings: Design, brand communication, project responsibility

listings.title: Project management
listings.content:
A team is only as good as its shared vision. In project management, you make sure that this vision is communicated and achieved. This includes looking for project sponsors, communication to project stake-holders and general project management. 

 Learnings: Project responsibility, leading, handling stake-holders
